item.content:encoded:
Last week, we shed our boots and scarves and went to WordCamp Orlando to talk about multilingual content management. While it may be easy to
use WordPress in our own language, managing a multilingual site is another kettle of fish! We outlined the best content management practices and interface presentation for multilingual content (never, never, never Google Translate, and never use a little flag as a language selector!), then we analyzed the strengths and weaknesses of the solutions available.
